long_summary:
# Procurement Contract Summary

## Context
This Procurement Contract is established between B3 (the "Supplier") and Plasma Corporation (the "Buyer") to govern the supply of specified products over a defined term.

## Objectives
- To outline the terms under which the Supplier will provide certain products to the Buyer.
- To specify pricing, volume discounts, payment terms, confidentiality, and termination conditions.
- To ensure both parties understand their obligations and rights during the contract period.

## Buyer
- Name: Plasma Corporation

## Supplier
- Name: B3
- Address: 456 Oak Avenue, Cityville, USA
- Contact Person: Jane Doe
- Email: jane@xyzsuppliers.com
- Phone: +1-987-654-3210

## Purchase Details
- **Products/Services Provided:**
  - Product X3
  - Product Y3
  - Product Z3

- **Pricing:**
  - Product X3: $15 per unit
  - Product Y3: $25 per unit
  - Product Z3: $35 per unit

- **Volume Discounts:**
  - 100 to 500 units: 8.5% discount
  - 501 to 1000 units: 15% discount
  - Over 1000 units: 20% discount

## Contract Term
- **Effective Date:** March 2023
- **Expiry Date:** 3 years from Effective Date (i.e., March 2026), unless terminated earlier.

## Payment Terms
- Supplier will submit invoices as per agreed pricing.
- Buyer shall pay within 45 days of receiving a valid invoice.
- Payment Method: PayPal.

## Contract Termination
- **For Convenience:** Either party may terminate with 60 days written notice.
- **For Cause:** Immediate termination allowed in case of material breach by the other party.

## Confidentiality
- Both parties must keep confidential information private and not disclose to third parties without written consent.
- Upon termination, all confidential information must be returned promptly.

## Governing Law
- The contract is governed by the laws of the State of New York.

## Entire Agreement
- This document supersedes all prior agreements or understandings related to the subject matter.

## Execution
- The contract was signed by authorized signatories of both parties on April 15, 2023.
